context: Spinal Surgery,Lumbar Laminectomy Surgery for Spinal Stenosis,
review: *** ***** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ****** *** ***** *** ***** ******* ******** * I recommend for our friends & family. He treats the patient very well and don’t prescribe unnecessary tests. We met Dr Shyam when my Mother had a severe back pain due to fracture in spine. Doctor treated her well with proper medicines .Pain got subsided within a week. We also had treatment for my husband who had Spine issues .He has  great patience in answering all the questions and explains the problems . He is one of the doctor who adheres to ethical standards in practice. Very thankful to Dr Shyam for his friendly approach towards patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Came with severe backpain  burning sensation in left lowerlimb  and left leg pain , was not able  to sit and walk for more than 5 mins from  january 2023 .. Doctor has advised for surgery..under went surgery in January 2023 ... After surgery has 90percent better in backpain and burning in left leg and able to walk and sit for more than 15 to 30 mind.. And able to do all my activities... I would like to say thanks to Dr. Shyamsunder sir.. . And recommend this Dr for any spine related issues  thankyou..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am bedridden with severebackpain for 2months.
I went and consulted Dr. Shyam sunder in stretcher . 
He did MRI for me and diagnosed as TB SPINE with sever nerve compression. And advised for surgery immediately and done surgery. It's 6 weeks after surgery now am 90 percent  better , walking well with out support. Am very happy.

tags: None
review: Bad experience.********* ***** ***************.Speaks all the technical terms of  medicine *** ******** ************ *** ***** ******* and he and the staff coaxed us to go for an MRI.After the MRI,doctor no where to be seen.********* ***************I would not recommend him.

tags: None
review: My grand mother fell at home and had vertebra fracture.consulted dr shyam sunder with severe pain.he did cement injection in to bone under local anesthesia.morning admitted and evening discharged.she is 90%releaved of her pain and walking well now..very happy with treatment .

I was very well taken of at doctor care.everyone very nice and it is nice to be treated well since you are the patient in need of help caring smiling laughing is good.i will come continue to come here i was  very well taken care of .thank you very much for corporation  god bless  you and best wishes to the udai omni

tags: None
review: I Consulted Dr. Shyam sundar with severe low back pain not able to sit and walk, after doing MRI And Xray he suggested go for surgery I prepared my mind going with surgery in view of severe pain and proceeded with surgery; after surgery I relieved of my pain and walked on 2nd day of surgery. I'm very happy with the explanation of the problems and the surgical outcome care taken by the Doctor. I'm happy to suggest Dr shyam sundar for people who are suffering with spine related issues like back pain and neck pain

review: i consulted with severe neck and  left hand pain with instability in walking  dr.said to do mri, mri shows big disc problem(c6 c7) dr adviced surgery from front of neck , we underwent surgery immediatley and startd walking next day and pain is gone very happy to recomend  DR.SHYAM SUNDERr for spine related issues.

review: My Mother Tahera begum suffering from slip disc pain from last two years, she went to many hospitals but she not get a proper treatment from other doctors and after words we went to germenten hospital we went there and treatment from dr shyam sundar sir and he advise for a surgery, after surgery my mother health was good Alhmd. (Dr shyam sundar was a best orthopaedic surgeon) Im highly recommend him for orthopaedic surgery and pain.
